sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Home.css"; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to Velavan Super Stores

Velavan Super Stores is a retail chain offering a wide range of products for everyday needs. It provides quality goods at affordable prices, including groceries, household items, and personal care products. The store focuses on customer satisfaction with a clean, organized, and easy shopping experience. Velavan Super Stores is always updated with the latest products and offers great deals, making it a go-to place for both essentials and special offers.

{/* Image Carousel without External Libraries */}
{/* Image Grid - Shop by Category */}

Shop by Category

Snacks

Masalas

Cleaning

Chocolates

Beverages

{/* Our Brands Section */}

Our Brands

Britannia

Colgate

Nestle

Dove

head & Shoulders

{/* Features Section */}

ðŸ›’ Wide Range of Products

From fresh produce to household essentials, we have everything you need.

ðŸšš Fast & Reliable Delivery

Get your groceries delivered to your doorstep with our quick service.

ðŸ’° Best Prices & Offers

Enjoy the best discounts and deals on all your favorite brands.

); }; export default Home;
